welcomeInfo.welcomeMessageHeading: Let‚Äôs take a quick 30 second break
welcomeInfo.welcomeMessageIntro:
Every morning, I will help you silence your urge to check email/Facebook and help you to do your morning routine instead.

You can configure your own routine later but for now, let‚Äôs try out some sample activities (deep breathing/stretching).

While you breathe deeply/stretch, think of how awesome you‚Äôll be if you stick to your morning routine every day.
welcomeInfo.welcomeEndMessage: Hope you feel calmer. You can now personalise your morning routine by clicking on the icon <icon> on the top bar and choosing Preferences -> Settings.
welcomeInfo.welcomeMessageOnlyBreakIntro: Throughout the day, I'll remind you to take regular breaks to keep your mind sharp and your body flexible. Here's an example of a break activity: 30 seconds of deep breathing.
welcomeInfo.titleSelectActivity: What 30 seconds of activity do you want to do?
welcomeInfo.takingBreaksText: Taking breaks throughout the day helps with stress and focus.

activityInfo.startMorningHabitTitleText: Good Morning! Here are the habits to kick off an awesome day.
activityInfo.startEveningHabitTitleText: Good Evening! Let‚Äôs go through your wind down routine.
activityInfo.lastActivityFinishedText: <ACTIVITY> finished!‚úÖ You‚Äôve earned your screen time. üí™
activityInfo.startBreakActivityTitleText: It‚Äôs time for a micro break. Let‚Äôs do <TIME> of <ACTIVITY> to keep your mind and body sharp.
activityInfo.beforeYouStartText: Before you start, take a few moments to reflect on why you want to do these habits. Then visualise yourself beginning the habit sequence. Mentally walk through any of the habits that are going to be harder. This process will help reduce "limbic friction", i.e. prime your brain to do the habits no matter what, even if you don't have the app available.
activityInfo.beforeYouBeginText: Before you begin, take 30 seconds to visualise yourself performing each of the habits. This sounds kooky but research indicates that doing a mental rehearsal like this increases the likelihood of you completing the habits and makes the habits more sticky so that even if you don't have access to your computer/this app, you'll still do all the habits.
activityInfo.habitsProgressText: You have completed <duration> of habits - <totalduration> to go. You can do it!
activityInfo.visualizeDescriptionText: Before you begin your routine, take 30 seconds to engage in "extrapersonal focus": try your best to keep your eyes fixed on the target. Research from Balcetis and colleagues in 2020 indicates that concentrating on a visual point will sharpen your focus and increase the likelihood of completing your routine.
activityInfo.lastActivitySkippedText: <ACTIVITY> skipped! You‚Äôve earned your screen time. üí™
activityInfo.startNonTimerBreakActivityTitleText: It‚Äôs time for a micro break. Let‚Äôs do <ACTIVITY> to keep your mind and body sharp.
activityInfo.activitySkippedUnlockNowSoundText: <ACTIVITY> skipped. You‚Äôve earned your screen time.
activityInfo.activityFinishedUnlockNowSoundText: <ACTIVITY> finished. You‚Äôve earned your screen time.

common.wrapupButtonText: Let's wrap up for the day
common.stayFocusedText: OK - Stay focused throughout the day!
common.letsCreatAccountText: Now let's set up an account for you
common.daysRemainingText: Trial version - <DAYS> of 7 trial days remaining
common.uninstallConfirmText: Are you sure you want to give up all your habits and uninstall Focus Bear?
common.uninstallDoneText: All the app related processes will stop and the app will close itself and then you can drag the app and move to trash/bin.
common.shutdownNotificationTitle: It's time to wrap up for the day. Your shutdown time is in 5 minutes.
common.appBlockNotificationTitle: <APP_NAME> isn't allowed in the <FOCUS_NAME> focus mode.
common.checkInternetText: Unable to connect to server. Please check your internet connection.
common.askUninstallReasonText: Can you share why you're uninstalling?
common.habitsHardReasonText: My habits are too hard - I can't handle them
common.emailTitle: Your Email (if you want us to reply):
common.someProblemInCredentialText: There was a problem connecting to the backend server. Please login again.
common.askUninstallReasonText2: Damn sorry, it seems like we let you down. We're in the early stages of this product and really want to get feedback to make it better. Could you tell us why you're uninstalling?
common.timeIncorrectText: Your system time seems to be incorrect - it's saying the current time is <SYSTEM_TIME> but the actual time is <TRUE_TIME>. Focus Bear won't work properly if you don't have your system time configured correctly. Once you have adjusted the time settings, click "I am ready to start my habits" button below.
common.buttonIAmReadyText: I am ready to start my habits
common.buttonInstructionsText: Click Here to see instructions for fixing your time settings
common.notificationVideoCallText: Looks like you're in a video call. I won't interrupt you with micro-breaks during the meeting to avoid embarrassing screensharing moments. Enjoy the meeting!
common.activitiesSyncErrorText: Focus Bear was not able to sync the activities' statistics due to bad internet.
common.alertAppRestartText: Focus Bear automatically restarts if it gets force quit/crashes to make sure you always have help combatting distractions. If you want to quit the app/take a break, use the Quit option from the Focus Bear menu bar.
common.buttonDontTellAgainText: Got it - don't tell me again
common.toolTipColorBoxText: Choose a color to be displayed in the background of the top menu bar icon to help identify the Focus Mode you are running.
common.notificationFirefoxText: FYI we can't block distractions in Firefox yet but if you use Chrome or Safari, we'll be here to support you to stay on track
common.cutOffTimePassedText: Running low on time - let's just focus on the high priority habits for the rest of the evening.
common.noHighPriorityActivityText: No activities with high Priority found.
common.askExtendFocusText: Still in the flow? Extend the session
common.settingsChangedText: It looks like your settings have been updated. App will restart to take effect.
common.alertUploadLogText: Do you want to upload the logs to our server for us to review what was broken?
common.reminderUninstallText: Quick reminder: you need to drag the Focus Bear from the Applications folder to Trash to fully uninstall the app.
common.alertOnboardingVideoText: You'll be able to use the Focus Bear menu as soon as you have finished watching the onboarding video.

abortingCountDownInfo.subTitle: Are you sure you want to give up on your habits? Please take 10 seconds to reflect on whether you are serious about cancelling.
abortingCountDownInfo.message: While you wait, reflect on why you‚Äôre doing this. If it was because your routine was too ambitious, perhaps scale it back to only be a few minutes long so that it‚Äôs easier to do it than not do it. If you‚Äôre cancelling because the app is broken, we're really sorry and would appreciate your feedback.
abortingCountDownInfo.buttonAbortCancelText: I didn‚Äôt mean it. Let me do my habits!

abortingConfirmInfo.subTitle: Can you share why you're cancelling?

dropDown_1.title: I've got an emergency
dropDown_1.description: Uh oh! Hope everything is ok. Restoring access immediately and cancelling habits for next 4 hours.. Your normal routine will resume after that.

dropDown_2.title: The app is broken
dropDown_2.description: Oh no! We're really sorry. We'll deactivate all popups. Can you please let us know what happened?Ôπ°
dropDown_2.emailTitle: Your Email (if you want us to reply):

dropDown_3.title: My habits are too hard - I can't handle them
dropDown_3.description: Ah understandable. Would you like to reset your habits to be 30 seconds each and max 5 minutes? A short routine is better than nothing. You can build from there.
dropDown_3.buttonDontWantText:
NO I don't want a 
routine at all!

startSmallInfo.subTitle: Starting small..
startSmallInfo.activityResetText: We‚Äôve reset your habits and break activities for you. They‚Äôre now each only 30 seconds long which should make it more manageable.
startSmallInfo.activityRemovedText: We removed a few activities so that the total routine is 5 minutes long.
startSmallInfo.changeSettingsText: You can alter your settings later from the top toolbar icon <icon>
startSmallInfo.shareFeedbackText: Can you share some feedback about why your habits were too hard?Ôπ°

givingUpInfo.subTitle: Giving up on your routine

quittingCountDownInfo.subTitle: Are you sure you want to Quit? Please take 2 seconds to reflect on whether you are serious about quitting.

askQuitVcInfo.subTitlePostpone: You're in the middle of your <ROUTINE> routine. Do you want to skip/postpone <HABITNAME> or turn the app off completely?

shutOffTimeInfo.title: Time to wind down
shutOffTimeInfo.subTitle: You told me you wanted to stay off your computer from <SHUTOFFTIME> to <STARTTIME>. Enjoy your evening and sleep well. Look forward to helping you with your morning routine tomorrow.

shutOffAbortInfo.title: Emergency?

shutOffAbortInfo.shareFeedbackText: Feel free to write an explanation here:

shutOffAbortDoneInfo.subTitle: Sorry to hear that something bad has happened and you absolutely need to use your computer late at night. We‚Äôre unlocking your machine now. Your morning routine will still activate at <STARTTIME>. Hope you‚Äôre able to catch up on sleep during the day.

settings.title: Enter settings JSON below:
settings.schemaError: Your settings can not be validated.
settings.settingIsNotValidText: Sorry it seems like your settings aren‚Äôt valid. Please generate settings at https://settings.focusbear.io
settings.description:
Click on "Edit Settings" to modify your existing settings.
If you are an advanced user click on "Advanced" to view or edit settings JSON

trialNagInfo.title: Focus Bear
trialNagInfo.description: We offer a 7-day trial period, during which you can evaluate Focus Bear at your leisure. The trial is a FULLY functional Trial and you can evaluate all the features.
trialNagInfo.getLicenseKeyDescription: if you do not have a license key, get one!

activationNagInfo.title: Focus Bear Activation
activationNagInfo.description: Paste License key in the text box below and click Activate to unlock all features.
activationNagInfo.buttonPasteText: Click here to paste the copied License Key.
activationNagInfo.noInternetSubTitle: Make sure your device is connected to the internet.
activationNagInfo.successfullyActivatedSubTitle: You have successfully activated Focus Bear!
activationNagInfo.activationErrorSubTitle: Please enter a valid License key.

menuInfo.noOfficeFriendlyActivityAlertText: You don't have any office friendly break activities. Do you want me to add one for you to stand up and stretch for 20 seconds?
menuInfo.noOfficeFriendlyActivityButtonSecondText: No I'm a machine! I don't need breaks
menuInfo.officeModeEnabledSuccessfullyText: Ok! I'll just prompt you to do activities that won't weird other people out (doing handstand pushups in the office might raise a few eyebrows).
menuInfo.toolTipOfficeMode: When you're working from the office, I will only give you appropriate break activities (e.g. chair stretches rather than pushups).
menuInfo.toolTipWfhMode: No-one's around! You can do break activities that are a bit more fun (e.g. Dance like no-one's watching).
menuInfo.toolTipLockedFocus: Use this if you want to focus on using one app/reading one article. We'll detect the current app + site you have open and block everything else.

preferencesInfo.checkBoxPomodoroText: Enter Pomodoro mode after completing morning routine
preferencesInfo.checkBoxReduceMotionText: Prefer reduced motion (don't show animated bears)
preferencesInfo.checkBoxPromptToAskNextHabitText: Occasionally prompt me to remember the next habit
preferencesInfo.alertChangeLanguageMessageText: Are you sure you want to change the language to <LANGUAGE>?
preferencesInfo.hardCorePomodoroEnabledText: Super Pomodoro mode enabled to focus on <FOCUSTYPE> for <COUNT> pomodoros on <DAYS>.
preferencesInfo.reviewFocusModeAlertText: Please review focus mode settings for super pomodoro mode.
preferencesInfo.workDurationEmptyErrorText: Work Duration can not be empty.
preferencesInfo.breakDurationEmptyErrorText: Break Duration can not be empty.
preferencesInfo.descriptionCuddlyBearText: Cuddly Bear mode: kind and gentle - gives you the benefit of the doubt when you open a non-allowed URL. Lets you temporarily allow blocked URLs during a focus mode.
preferencesInfo.descriptionGrizzlyBearText: Grizzly Bear mode: super strict - immediately block URLs that aren't allowed and don't let yourself allow them until the focus mode is over.
preferencesInfo.pomodoroDescriptionText: Pomodoro Mode cycles between deep work blocks where a focus mode is turned on (and distractions turned off) and break periods.
preferencesInfo.buttonLearnPomodoroTechniqueText: Learn more about the pomodoro technique here.
preferencesInfo.questionSkipHabitText: How easy do you want it to be to skip your habits?
preferencesInfo.radioButtonEasySkipText: Really easy - I want to be able to skip habits/breaks in a hurry
preferencesInfo.radioButtonHardSkipText: Make it hard to skip - otherwise I'll end up skipping habits + breaks most of the time
preferencesInfo.buttonExportLogsText: Click here to export logs to share with Support Team.
preferencesInfo.panelExportLogsText: Export logs to share with Focus Bear Support Team
preferencesInfo.exportSuccessText: Your logs are available to share in the FocusBearLogs.zip file in the <URL> directory
preferencesInfo.descriptionMeetingDetectionText: Enable meeting detection to automatically suggest starting "Meetings" focus mode when Focus Bear detects you are in a call.
preferencesInfo.descriptionHideDockText: Enable this to hide dock during allowed apps activities to minimize distractions. "System Events" permission will be required for this.
preferencesInfo.checkBoxHideDockText: Hide dock during activities having allowed apps.
preferencesInfo.alertChangeLanguageInfoText: Focus Bear will restart for the changes to take effect.
preferencesInfo.warningGrizzlyBearText: Warning: Grizzly Bear mode is not recommended until you have fully fleshed out your focus modes. We recommend starting with cuddly bear mode and switching to Grizzly Bear mode after a few weeks
preferencesInfo.helpText: Focus Bear is still a new app and you might encounter issues (or have great ideas on how to make it better). We'd really appreciate your feedback. You can email us at team@focusbear.io. Screenshots are really helpful to let us understand the problem. Also if you had a problem, please export your logs (use the link below) and attach it to the email.
preferencesInfo.checkBoxTabLimiterText: Prevent user from opening more browser tabs
preferencesInfo.checkBoxFullScreenEnabledText: Play activities in full screen mode

focusPreferencesInfo.titleFocusType: Use Focus Modes to stay focused on a certain type of work. Start a focus mode from the Focus Bear menu.
focusPreferencesInfo.titleAllowedSelectedUrls: Allow selected urls (works with Safari and Chrome only)
focusPreferencesInfo.noFocusAddedText: Please add a Focus Mode in the left panel.
focusPreferencesInfo.deleteFocusTypeMessageText: Are you sure you want to delete the selected Focus Mode?
focusPreferencesInfo.invalidDomainTextSecond: If you want to allow all urls please select "Allow all urls" instead.
focusPreferencesInfo.errorSameFocusType: Focus Mode with the same name already exists.
focusPreferencesInfo.appAlreadyExistsText: Some of the apps selected are already present in the list.
focusPreferencesInfo.focusCanNotDeleteSubTitle: The Default focus type cannot be deleted.
focusPreferencesInfo.focusModeOnText: Focus mode is on. Please deactivate the focus mode to delete it.
focusPreferencesInfo.hardCorePomodoroIsOnMessageText: Super Pomodoro mode is on. Please deactivate super Pomodoro mode to delete it.
focusPreferencesInfo.disablePomodoroModeAlertText: The selected focus mode is enabled in super pomodoro mode. Please disable super pomodoro mode to delete this.
focusPreferencesInfo.allowUrlInstructionFirstText: To allow a certain website: domain.com
focusPreferencesInfo.allowUrlInstructionSecondText: To allow all subdomains of a website: *.domain.com
focusPreferencesInfo.allowUrlInstructionThirdText: To allow any web pages that contain text in the URL or page title: reactnative or React Native
focusPreferencesInfo.blockUrlInstructionFirstText: To block a certain website: domain.com
focusPreferencesInfo.blockUrlInstructionSecondText: To block all subdomains of a website: *.domain.com
focusPreferencesInfo.titleBlockedSelectedUrls: Block selected urls (works with Safari and Chrome only)
focusPreferencesInfo.titleAllowUrlListApproch: Block everything except safe sites that I choose
focusPreferencesInfo.titleBlockUrlListApproch: Allow everything except certain distracting sites
focusPreferencesInfo.enterMultiUrlText: Enter single or multiple urls(one in each line)
focusPreferencesInfo.meetingsFocusInfoText: The meetings focus mode is used to detect when you are in a meeting so you don't get asked to take a break when you're in an important meeting. Add the apps and websites you use for video conferencing.
focusPreferencesInfo.descriptionAlwaysBlockedUrls: When you use this focus mode, all websites will be allowed except for your Always Blocked URLs
focusPreferencesInfo.titleBlockedApps: Which apps do you want to block?
focusPreferencesInfo.titleBlockedUrls: Below is the list of Always Blocked URLs:

focusPreferencesAdvancedInfo.runScriptBeforeText: Run apple script before starting focus mode.
focusPreferencesAdvancedInfo.runScriptAfterText: Run apple script after finishing focus mode.
focusPreferencesAdvancedInfo.instructionText: The URLs here will be blocked during this focus mode. Useful if you want to allow some websites but block others. For example, you could have *.google.com as an allowed URL but block tv.google.com
focusPreferencesAdvancedInfo.autoOnDoNotDisturbText: Turn on Do Not Disturb automatically when starting a focus mode.
focusPreferencesAdvancedInfo.needDndPermissionText: To turn on Do Not Disturb when starting a Focus Mode, Focus Bear needs Accessibility permissions. Would you like to give the permissions now?
focusPreferencesAdvancedInfo.runShellCommandBeforeText: Run shell script before starting focus mode.
focusPreferencesAdvancedInfo.runShellCommandAfterText: Run shell script after finishing focus mode.

focusInfo.focusAlreadyRunningText: A focus mode is already running. Please deactivate the running focus mode to start a new one.

startingFocusModeInfo.howMuchTimeText: How much time do you want to focus for?
startingFocusModeInfo.title: Starting <FOCUSTYPE>
startingFocusModeInfo.questionText: What do you plan to achieve during this focus block?
startingFocusModeInfo.onlyAllowSelectedAppText: You'll only be able to use <APP>
startingFocusModeInfo.onlyAllowSelectedAppAndUrlText: You'll only be able to use "<URL>" in <APP>
startingFocusModeInfo.explanationText: Setting an intention for the focus block helps prime your brain to accomplish that task.
startingFocusModeInfo.buttonStopFocusText: Stop current focus mode and start this one
startingFocusModeInfo.activityRunningCantStartFocusText: You can not start a focus mode while an activity is running.
startingFocusModeInfo.tipMaximumMinutesText: Tip: research indicates that 90 minutes is the maximum limit for focused work (ultradian rhythms). After that, your attention will naturally decline and you'll need to take a break.
startingFocusModeInfo.buttonShowTimerInMenuText: Show timer in menu bar when running a Focus Block

abortingFocusModeInfo.title: Deactivating Focus Block - <FOCUSTYPE>
abortingFocusModeInfo.questionText: Can you share why you're deactivating?
abortingFocusModeInfo.reasonsFirstText: I achieved what I wanted to.
abortingFocusModeInfo.reasonsThirdText: Focus mode is not working properly.

focusCompletedInfo.title: You did it!
focusCompletedInfo.subTitle: You have successfully completed the focus block - <FOCUSTYPE>
focusCompletedInfo.questionFirstText: What did you achieve during this time?
focusCompletedInfo.alertFullScreenBreakText: Do you want to take a full screen break?

focusSummaryInfo.title: You completed <COUNT> focus blocks today.
focusSummaryInfo.buttonNeedMoreTimeText: I need to work for one more minute
focusSummaryInfo.buttonStillNeedMoreTimeText: I still need to work more

discourageDefaultFocusInfo.title: Are you sure? It's pretty easy to get distracted without using a more restrictive focus mode
discourageDefaultFocusInfo.buttonCancelText: Bah I guess you're right - CANCEL!
discourageDefaultFocusInfo.buttonShutUpText: Shutup I know what I'm doing

suggestFocusInfo.title: Will you need to use other apps during the meeting? If not, I can block everything else to help you concentrate.
suggestFocusInfo.subTitle: On selecting "Block everything else" the app will start "Meetings" focus mode.
suggestFocusInfo.buttonCancelText: It's ok for me to use other apps during this meeting
suggestFocusInfo.buttonFalseDetectionText: False positive: I'm not in a meeting
suggestFocusInfo.titleFalseDetection: Sorry about that. Are you sure you're not using an app that is using your microphone? If we keep getting it wrong, click button below to disable meeting detection.
suggestFocusInfo.buttonCheckBoxText: Don't show this again when I join meetings

pomodoroInfo.title: It's time to focus
pomodoroInfo.questionFirstText: What do you want to achieve in this pomodoro session?
pomodoroInfo.questionSecondText: Which focus mode do you want to use?
pomodoroInfo.buttonHardcorePomodoroText: Use super pomodoro mode (lock in the focus mode for multiple pomodoros)
pomodoroInfo.howManyPomodoroText: How many pomodoros you want to focus for:
pomodoroInfo.chooseTheFocusModeText: Choose the focus mode and duration - you won't be able to change the focus mode until the time is up (you still get to use any app/website during the 5 minute break)
pomodoroInfo.alertWarningPaswwordSetText: To make super pomodoro mode more effective, we recommend setting a password in Preferences (ask someone else to do it for you) otherwise you'll still be able to cancel the focus modes before the time is up.
pomodoroInfo.completedPomodoroCountText: You have completed <COMPLETED_POMODORO> of <TOTAL_POMODORO> pomodoros. <REMAINING_POMODORO> more to go.

logQuantityInfo.title: Log Quantity of activity
logQuantityInfo.quantityIsEmptyText: Log quantity can not be empty.

enterPasswordViewInfo.title: Please enter the password to continue
enterPasswordViewInfo.alertConfirmResetPasswordSubTitle: Your current password will be removed after 24 hours. You can then set a new password. Proceed?
enterPasswordViewInfo.alertPasswordResetDoneSubTitle: Please set a new password after 24 hours.

passwordPreferencesInfo.infoText: You can reset the password at any time (but it has a 24hr cooling off period before it resets to stop you from cheating yourself). You'll need to provide the password when you cancel your morning/evening routine or super pomodoro mode. You can reset the password at any time - you just have to wait 24hrs.
passwordPreferencesInfo.passwordNotSetText: If you're struggling to stick to your habits, get a housemate/partner to set a password. You won't be able to skip habits without the password.
passwordPreferencesInfo.passwordSetText: Extra accountability: you have an active password set and can't skip your habits without getting a friend to enter the password.
passwordPreferencesInfo.passwordNotMatchAlertSubTitle: Confirm Password does not match with the main password. Please re enter.
passwordPreferencesInfo.passwordDisableAskText: Are you sure you want to disable your password?
passwordPreferencesInfo.questionPassword: When do you want to require a password?
passwordPreferencesInfo.buttonAbortingShutoffText: Using your computer late at night
passwordPreferencesInfo.buttonSkipEveningHabitAfterCutOffText: Postponing/skipping evening routine after cutoff time
passwordPreferencesInfo.buttonSavedPasswordText: I've saved the password somewhere safe

blockedUrlsViewInfo.title: Always Blocked URLs
blockedUrlsViewInfo.invalidDomainText: Adding * will block all urls. Please use another combination.
blockedUrlsViewInfo.subTitleText: "Block these URLs even if you're not in a focus block. You might want to put social media or news sites that you would rather not use at any time. You can always set up an evening routine activity where you explicitly allow access to Facebook so that you can still stay connected - just not during your morning routine/work day."

rememberNextHabitViewInfo.randomPhraseRightChoice4: I can just retire now because you know exactly what you're doing üôÇ
rememberNextHabitViewInfo.title: What comes next?
rememberNextHabitViewInfo.description: I want to make sure you don't become too dependent on me. There will be days where you don't have access to your computer but that doesn't mean you won't do your habits. Think of me as training wheels - I'm here to help you deepen the habits until they become automatic. Let's do a quick exercise to make sure you remember how to stack your habits even when I'm not there.
rememberNextHabitViewInfo.questionText: You just completed <LAST_HABIT_NAME>. What habit will you do next?
rememberNextHabitViewInfo.enterToChooseText: Press enter to choose an option

preloadFocusModesViewInfo.title: What type of work do you mainly do?
preloadFocusModesViewInfo.gotItText: Got it. We've set up a Focus Mode to help you be super productive while you're doing <WORK_TYPE>. You can add other Focus Modes later.
preloadFocusModesViewInfo.description: We'll customise your focus mode depending on type of work you do.

pomodoroPreferencesAdvancedInfo.descriptionHardcorePomodoroText: (Lock in the focus mode for multiple pomodoros)
pomodoroPreferencesAdvancedInfo.descriptionChooseFocusFirstText: You won't be able to change the focus mode until the time is up
pomodoroPreferencesAdvancedInfo.descriptionChooseFocusSecondText: (you still get to use any app/website during the 5 minute break)
pomodoroPreferencesAdvancedInfo.HowManyPomodoroText: How many pomodoros you want to focus for:
pomodoroPreferencesAdvancedInfo.selectDaysForPomodoroText: Schedule specific days you want to run the super pomodoro mode after Morning Routine:
pomodoroPreferencesAdvancedInfo.selectAtleastOneDayText: Please select at least one day.

accountVcInfo.title: Your Account Information
accountVcInfo.logoutAlertText: Are you sure you want to logout?
accountVcInfo.restoreText: If you've already purchased Focus Bear subscription, you can restore that purchase.

activityPostponeInfo.postponeHabitsText: If you have something urgent, you can postpone Habits for a few minutes.
activityPostponeInfo.postponeBreakText: If you have something urgent, you can postpone the Break Activity for 5 Minutes.
activityPostponeInfo.buttonTakeBreakText: Argh ok I'll take a break!
activityPostponeInfo.postponedLastBreakText: You postponed the last break - are you sure you can't make time for the break now?
activityPostponeInfo.officeModeEnableText: Ok I'll give you some break activities that are appropriate to do in an office environment.
activityPostponeInfo.postponedLastHabitText: You've postponed your habits a few times. Are you sure you want to postpone again?
activityPostponeInfo.buttonDoHabitText: I changed my mind - I'll do my habits
activityPostponeInfo.titlePostponeOrSkip: Want to postpone the break or skip it completely?
activityPostponeInfo.titleAskOfficeMode: Do you not have time for a break right now or are you in the office and it's not appropriate to do <ACTIVITY>?

brainDumpVcInfo.title: Focus Bear - Brain dump
brainDumpVcInfo.titleWorkNoteFirst: Things I'll do in my next break:
brainDumpVcInfo.titleWorkNoteSecond: Things you wanted to do in your break:
brainDumpVcInfo.titleNotFocusSession: You're currently not in a focus block
brainDumpVcInfo.writeThingsHereText: Dump down ideas you have so you don't forget - anything you write here will remain forever unless you delete it

askLogInVcInfo.title: Save your habits to your account.
askLogInVcInfo.messageText: Sign In with a Focus Bear account to manage your time without thinking about it. Having an account helps you set your computer use hours, create a custom morning and night routine, and customize your focus modes for different activities.
askLogInVcInfo.descriptionText: Nearly done! Let's grab a few details to save your habits.

upgradeNowVcInfo.syncInfoText: After you pay, click the Sync Payment Status button below

onboardingPostponeVcInfo.title: If you have something urgent, you can postpone the Onboarding process for a few minutes.

welcomeOnboardingVcInfo.subTitle: Welcome aboard!
welcomeOnboardingVcInfo.descriptionFirstText: Looking forward to helping you form healthy habits and get more deep work done. To start off, we want to show you a demo of how Focus Bear works. It takes 2 minutes and requires 100% attention from you.
welcomeOnboardingVcInfo.descriptionSecondText: You won't be able to use other apps during the onboarding. Do you have time now or shall we do it a bit later?
welcomeOnboardingVcInfo.confirmText: Double checking that you have 2 minutes now.
welcomeOnboardingVcInfo.gotTwoMinutesText: Got two minutes to try out our habit guide feature?
welcomeOnboardingVcInfo.subTitleNewText: Next Up: Building habits to support focus
welcomeOnboardingVcInfo.titleBlockedSuccessfully: Awesome! We look forward to helping you block distractions.
welcomeOnboardingVcInfo.titleBlockedFailed:
We'll be in touch shortly to get that fixed.

In the meantime, we can show you the habit features.
welcomeOnboardingVcInfo.alertConfirmText:
Are you sure? You can start with really tiny habits like 2 minutes of meditation in the morning.
Focus Bear was built by a neurodiverse team (a few of us have ADHD) and we find the habit features make a huge difference to how the rest of the day goes.
welcomeOnboardingVcInfo.buttonOkShowHabitText: OK fine - show me the habit feature
welcomeOnboardingVcInfo.buttonCancelHabitText: No I'm not interested right now

customLoginVcInfo.confirmPasswordNotMatchText: Confirm Password does not match with the main password. Please re enter.
customLoginVcInfo.passwordRuleSecondText: Contain at least 3 of the following 4 types of characters:
customLoginVcInfo.checkBoxPasswordSavedText: I saved the password somewhere safe
customLoginVcInfo.explainCreateAccountText: Create an account to sync your habit + block settings across all your devices.
customLoginVcInfo.passwordGenerateText: We generated a password for you

loginHelpVcInfo.title: An incognito window should open where you can Login or Register. If you don't see it, please try opening Safari manually. If you still can't see it

onboardingCardsInfo.title: Important Notes
onboardingCardsInfo.controllingBrowserDescription: When you next open a browser tab, you'll see this popup. The reason we ask for permissions to control your browser is so we can block distracting websites when you activate focus mode.
onboardingCardsInfo.signupSuccessText: Great you're all signed up. I'll just give you a few tips before you start using it.
onboardingCardsInfo.buildingHabitsDescription: Focus Bear will help you develop stronger habits in the morning and evening by blocking distractions. But don't worry - if you need to access your computer in a hurry, just click the "Exit Fullscreen" button in the top right.
onboardingCardsInfo.brainBreaksDescription: To avoid screen headaches and neck strain, Focus Bear will encourage you to take breaks at regular intervals. We give you a 30 second warning so you can postpone the break if it's a bad time. We also detect if you're in a meeting and don't show breaks as that might lead to awkward screensharing moments otherwise!
onboardingCardsInfo.brainBreaksDescriptionWIN: To avoid screen headaches and neck strain, Focus Bear will encourage you to take breaks at regular intervals. We give you a 30 second warning so you can postpone the break if it's a bad time.
onboardingCardsInfo.exploreTipsText: Click next to explore the tips to use Focus Bear.
onboardingCardsInfo.signinSuccessText: Great you're all signed in. I'll just give you a few tips before you start using it.
onboardingCardsInfo.privacyDescription: We take your privacy and security very seriously. We do not log which websites or apps you use. We do sync your habit data to our server but this is only to support cross device distraction blocking. Your data is encrypted and we don't let anyone else see it. For more details, feel free to email team@focusbear.io or refer to our privacy policy:
onboardingCardsInfo.buttonPrivacyText: Click here to view Privacy Policy

breakWarningVcInfo.title: Your <DURATION> second micro break starts in
breakWarningVcInfo.postponeConfirmText: You postponed the last micro break - are you sure you can't make time for the break now?
breakWarningVcInfo.buttonTakeBreakText: Argh ok I'll take a break!
breakWarningVcInfo.descriptionText: Micro breaks help keep your energy + alertness levels consistent throughout the day and have positive impacts on your posture (no more screen headaches).
breakWarningVcInfo.descriptionMeetingsText: Micro breaks can help you stay focused in meetings.
breakWarningVcInfo.titleMeetings: Your <DURATION> second mid meeting break starts in

askAppWorkVcInfo.title: Welcome to Focus Bear
askAppWorkVcInfo.titleSelectHabitPack: Choose a habit pack to get started
askAppWorkVcInfo.anythingElseText: Anything else you hope Focus Bear can help with? (We'll try to take your feedback on board)
askAppWorkVcInfo.titleSelectBreaks: Choose your break activities to get started
askAppWorkVcInfo.chooseOptionsText: Choose one of the following options:
askAppWorkVcInfo.infoBuildHabitsText: Focus Bear can help you with morning and evening routines. The app will guide you through habits like mindfulness, journalling, exercise, planning your day or anything you care about.
askAppWorkVcInfo.infoStayFocusedText: Focus Bear can help block distracting websites and apps while you're working to help you get more done.
askAppWorkVcInfo.habitPackInfoText: A habit pack is a collection of habits to do in the morning, the evening and during breaks

toolBoxVcInfo.title: The toolbox makes it easy to open the apps and websites that you've allowed in the <FOCUS_NAME> focus mode. You can access it from the Menu under Tools.
toolBoxVcInfo.checkBoxText: Don't show this anymore when I start a focus block
toolBoxVcInfo.titleForActivity: The toolbox makes it easy to open the apps and websites that you've allowed in the <ACTIVITY_NAME> activity. You can access it from the Menu under Tools.
toolBoxVcInfo.checkBoxActivityText: Don't Show toolbox when starting a habit with allowed apps

skipHabitVcInfo.title: Skipping habit in
skipHabitVcInfo.buttonDoHabitsText: I changed my mind - I'll do my habits

popUpBlockConfirmVcInfo.title: Do you need to use <URL> when you're focusing on <FOCUSTYPE>?
popUpBlockConfirmVcInfo.firstTempItemAllowText: Allowed! Heads up: it might be a little annoying at first to have to keep allowing sites/apps but within a few days, you'll have taught Focus Bear what apps and websites are productive.
popUpBlockConfirmVcInfo.checkingUrlText: Checking if this URL is safe to use for your current focus mode. Will take about 4-5 seconds to check. If safe, it will automatically be allowed.
popUpBlockConfirmVcInfo.urlNotVerifiedText: The status of this url could not be verified.
popUpBlockConfirmVcInfo.progressInfoText: You're teaching Focus Bear what sites and apps are productive for you. It takes a bit of effort at first but within a few days, you'll have taught Focus Bear what apps and websites are productive.

easyPostponeVcInfo.title: Ok I get it - now's not a good time. I'll try again in 5 minutes. You can postpone for longer if you need to.
easyPostponeVcInfo.infoText: If you want more of a nudge to stick to your habits, open preferences and change the friction level from the general settings tab.

popUpOfflineVcInfo.titleOffline: It seems like you're offline. Please go online to continue with your habits.
popUpOfflineVcInfo.titleStillOffline: Sorry we still can't reach our backend server. Please check your internet and try again. If you are definitely online and are getting this error, please contact team@focusbear.io

whySkipHabitVcInfo.title: Why do you want to skip?

habitSkipEasinessVcInfo.title: Welcome to Focus Bear
habitSkipEasinessVcInfo.questionText: How easy do you want it to be to skip your habits?
habitSkipEasinessVcInfo.radioButtonFirstText: Really easy - I want to be able to skip habits/breaks in a hurry
habitSkipEasinessVcInfo.radioButtonSecondText: Make it hard to skip - otherwise I'll end up skipping habits + breaks most of the time

onboardingBlockedUrlsInfo.title: Welcome to Focus Bear
onboardingBlockedUrlsInfo.questionText: Which sites do you waste time on?
onboardingBlockedUrlsInfo.description: You can block certain sites by default to avoid going down rabbit holes. Tick the sites that you never want to use while you're working.
onboardingBlockedUrlsInfo.enterUrlText: Enter URL or keyword to block:
onboardingBlockedUrlsInfo.tipText: In case you're worried - we don't track which websites you're using.

preloadFocusModeAppsVcInfo.titleForApps: What apps do you normally use while you're doing <WORK_TYPE>?
preloadFocusModeAppsVcInfo.descriptionApps: Don't worry you can still use other apps if you need to but these are the apps that are most likely to be productive for you while you're doing <WORK_TYPE>. You can change these settings later on.
preloadFocusModeAppsVcInfo.subTitleForApps: Add the apps you plan to use:
preloadFocusModeAppsVcInfo.descriptionUrls: Don't worry you can still use other websites if you need to but these are the sites that are most likely to be productive for you while you're doing <WORK_TYPE>. You can change these settings later on.
preloadFocusModeAppsVcInfo.subTitleForUrls: Add the websites you plan to use:

focusTipsVcInfo.title: Quick How Tos
focusTipsVcInfo.tip1title: How To 1: Start a focus block
focusTipsVcInfo.tip1Text: You can try your new focus mode out now by clicking the Play icon (click the top menu icon first).
focusTipsVcInfo.tip1TextWIN: You can try it out now by clicking the Play icon next to your new focus mode in the list that appears on clicking the Focus Bear menu icon in the System Tray.
focusTipsVcInfo.tip2Text: To modify this Focus Mode, first click on Preferences in the Focus Bear popup menu.
focusTipsVcInfo.tip3Text: Then click on the Focus tab in the Preferences window that opens up.
focusTipsVcInfo.tip4Text: Then choose your focus mode from the left list of Focus Modes. Edit the settings in the right side.
focusTipsVcInfo.tip2Newtitle: How To 2: Teach Focus Bear what is productive
focusTipsVcInfo.tip2NewText: As you use this Focus Mode, Focus Bear will ask you whether each website/app is productive.
focusTipsVcInfo.tip3NewText: At the end of the focus block, you can permanently allow those apps/websites (or choose not to).
focusTipsVcInfo.tip4NewText: You can even add keywords, e.g. "React Native" and any website with that keyword will be allowed.
focusTipsVcInfo.tip0Text: To help you get more done, let's set up a Focus Mode. A Focus Mode is a set of apps and websites that are productive. When you start a Focus Block, non-productive apps/sites are blocked to help you avoid going down rabbitholes.

howHeardVcInfo.title: How did you hear about Focus Bear?

trialExpiredNagInfo.descriptionText: Normally I'd guide you through your morning routine at this time. Click Reactivate to set up your Focus Bear subscription and enjoy the productivity and health benefits from the app again.

inactivityNagInfo.title: Still interested in improving your habits and productivity?

shareFeedbackVcInfo.title: Can you give us any feedback on the app?

addFocusTempUrlsOrAppsVcInfo.title: Do you want to permanently allow these Apps or URLs that you used during this focus block?
addFocusTempUrlsOrAppsVcInfo.keywordsInfoText:
To avoid you having to add websites individually, we can scan the titles of the web pages you allowed in this session and identify the most common key phrases. For example, if you opened ten pages relating to Figma 'How to link between pages in Figma'. 'How to share Figma files' etc. We can detect that Figma is the most common phrase and add it to your allow list. After that, any web page with 'Figma' in the title will be automatically allowed. We don't store the details of the pages you visit - we immediately discard the information after analysing it.

You can type keywords below that should be allowed. E.g. you can use React Native as a keyword and then any page with that phrase in the URL/title will be allowed.
addFocusTempUrlsOrAppsVcInfo.titleWindowText: Teach Focus Bear how you focus

allTracksVcInfo.title: Here are some focus music tracks (some are binaural beats) you can use to help you focus. FYI the research is ambivalent about binaural beats - you'll likely get similar benefits from using your own music. Just make sure the music doesn't have lyrics otherwise you'll get distracted.

breaksBrainDumpVcInfo.title: Capture your thoughts before starting your micro break
breaksBrainDumpVcInfo.description: Taking regular micro breaks (every 20 minutes is recommended) is crucial for avoiding eye strain and postural issues. You might be worried that it will take you out of your flow and disrupt your productivity. Let's capture what you were just working on so that you won't lose your train of thought after the break. BTW you'll often find that when you take a break and give your brain some time in the "default mode network", you'll come up with novel solutions to a problem you'd been struggling with. Not necessarily a productivity killer at all üòâ
breaksBrainDumpVcInfo.subTitle: You're going to feel great after this break. Write down what you were just working on so you don't forget.
placeholders: Building an AI-powered coffee mug that can detect when you need a refill
Optimizing a website for users browsing on a Game Boy Color
Creating a machine learning algorithm that predicts which coworker will bring donuts to the office next
Writing a script that generates random passwords that only consist of emojis
Designing a user interface for a self-driving unicycle
breaksBrainDumpVcInfo.subTitleMeetings: You're going to focus better on the meeting after this break. Write down any quick thoughts you don't forget.

askWorkTimeVcInfo.descriptionStartupTime: Choose the absolute earliest time you ever plan to start your morning routine. You can start your morning routine at any time after <STARTTIME>. Before <STARTTIME> your computer will be locked because you should be sleeping üò¥ (you can still unlock it if you have an emergency. We'll show you how to unlock it shortly.).
askWorkTimeVcInfo.descriptionShutDownTime: At <SHUTOFFTIME>, Focus Bear will take over your computer and other devices and guide you through your evening routine to help you wind down for the evening. (you can still unlock it if you have an emergency. We'll show you how to unlock it shortly.).
askWorkTimeVcInfo.questionText: When do you want to start and finish work?
askWorkTimeVcInfo.questionStartWorkTimeText: What time do you start work?
askWorkTimeVcInfo.questionFinishWorkTimeText: What time do you finish work?
askWorkTimeVcInfo.explanationText:
Your schedule looks like:

üê• <MORNING_ROUTINE_START_TIME> - <MORNING_ROUTINE_END_TIME> - Morning routine

üíº <MORNING_ROUTINE_END_TIME> - <START_WORK_TIME> - Prepare to start work (buffer time)

üí™ <START_WORK_TIME> - <END_WORK_TIME> - Work

ü•± <END_WORK_TIME> - <EVENING_ROUTINE_END_TIME> - Do evening routine.

üò¥ <EVENING_ROUTINE_END_TIME> - Finish evening routine - computer locked (you can unlock it if you need it)
askWorkTimeVcInfo.lockComputerTimeText: üò¥ <EVENING_ROUTINE_END_TIME> - Finish evening routine - computer locked (you can unlock it if you need it)

welcomeVcInfo.descriptionFirstText: Focus Bear helps you avoid distractions and build healthy habits.
welcomeVcInfo.descriptionSecondText: Let's start out by blocking distractions.
welcomeVcInfo.buttonAlreadyHaveAccountText: I already have a Focus Bear account

onboardingControllingBrowserVcInfo.title: Permission to block distractions
onboardingControllingBrowserVcInfo.descriptionText: Alright, now you need to give Focus Bear permission to block distractions.

onboardingPrivacyTipVcInfo.title: Privacy and Security
onboardingPrivacyTipVcInfo.subTitle: We take your privacy and security very seriously and will never share your data ever.
onboardingPrivacyTipVcInfo.descriptionText:
üôà We do not log which websites or apps you use.

üîÑ We do sync your habit data to our server but this is only to support cross device distraction blocking.

üîí Your data is encrypted and we don't let anyone else see it.
onboardingPrivacyTipVcInfo.moreDetailText: For more details, refer to our privacy policy or feel free to email team@focusbear.io.
onboardingPrivacyTipVcInfo.buttonViewPrivacyText: Click here to view Privacy Policy

tryBlockUrlVcInfo.descriptionTryBlockText: Try it out - please attempt to access <BLOCKED_URL> through your web browser. It should block the site.
tryBlockUrlVcInfo.titleWhichBrowser: Oops! Which browser did you try?
tryBlockUrlVcInfo.tryBrowsersBlockText:
Did you use Safari, Google Chrome, Sidekick, Brave Browser or Microsoft Edge?
We can only block if you use those browsers.
tryBlockUrlVcInfo.tryBrowsersBlockTextWIN:
Did you use Google Chrome, Firefox, Brave Browser or Microsoft Edge?
We can only block if you use those browsers.
tryBlockUrlVcInfo.buttonNowBlockedText: I just tried those browsers and it worked!
tryBlockUrlVcInfo.emailUsText: Sorry about that üòì Any chance you could email us (team@focusbear.io) and we'll try and fix it for you?

askBuildHabitsVcInfo.titleBlockedSuccessfully: Awesome! We look forward to helping you block distractions.
askBuildHabitsVcInfo.titleBlockedFailed:
We'll be in touch shortly to get that fixed.

In the meantime, we can show you the habit features.
askBuildHabitsVcInfo.subTitle: Next Up: Building habits to support focus
askBuildHabitsVcInfo.description:
One other thing that we find really helps is building habits to support focus. For example, even a small amount of aerobic exercise + meditation in the morning has been shown to boost concentration during the day.
Would you like to try out the habit features?
askBuildHabitsVcInfo.alertConfirmText:
Are you sure? You can start with really tiny habits like 2 minutes of meditation in the morning.
Focus Bear was built by a neurodiverse team (a few of us have ADHD) and we find the habit features make a huge difference to how the rest of the day goes.
askBuildHabitsVcInfo.buttonOkShowHabitText: OK fine - show me the habit feature
askBuildHabitsVcInfo.buttonCancelHabitText: No I'm not interested right now

askAccountVcInfo.title: Setting up a Focus Bear Account
askAccountVcInfo.descriptionText: How about setting up an account so you can sync your block preferences across your devices?
askAccountVcInfo.tipText: Setting up an account doesn't cost anything - you still get a 7 day free trial- but it is necessary to enable the more advanced features.
askAccountVcInfo.alertText: If you feel like setting up an account, just click on the Focus Bear menu icon.

askOnboardingVideoVcInfo.title: Your account's ready to go!
askOnboardingVideoVcInfo.subTitle: Here's a short video that explains how to use Focus Bear.

naturalBreaksDetectionVcInfo.title: It looks like you're on a break. Well done on taking care of yourself.
naturalBreaksDetectionVcInfo.buttonWrongDetectionText: You're wrong! I wasn't on a break
naturalBreaksDetectionVcInfo.titleTakeBreak: Ok do you want to take a break now üòÖ?
naturalBreaksDetectionVcInfo.buttonStartBreakText: Yup I need a break now

aiPermissionVcInfo.title: Do you want to use AI to decide if websites should be allowed?
aiPermissionVcInfo.descriptionText: We'll use Open AI to decide if the site is valid based on your current focus mode, intention, the URL, the website title and the first 100 characters of the content. This is anonymous - no identifying details are shared.
aiPermissionVcInfo.titleAlertText: Alright. You can change this setting later under Preferences - Settings - AI

aISettingVcInfo.checkBoxMorningMotivationText: Use AI to generate a personalised motivational message each morning
aISettingVcInfo.descriptionMorningMotivationText: Your routine streak and your morning routine activities will be sent to Open AI. No other details will be shared but if you have anything in the habit titles that would identify you, we recommend you remove it.
aISettingVcInfo.checkBoxWebsiteAllowText: Use AI to decide if websites should be allowed
aISettingVcInfo.descriptionWebsiteAllowText: We'll use Open AI to decide if the site is valid based on your current focus mode, intention, the URL, the website title and the first 100 characters of the content. This is anonymous - no identifying details are shared.
aISettingVcInfo.checkBoxShowAllowAlertText: Show alert with reason when AI automatically allows a url

askBreakTimeVcInfo.title: Break reminders
askBreakTimeVcInfo.questionText: How frequently do you want to  take breaks?
askBreakTimeVcInfo.descriptionText: (Optometrists recommend a 20 second break every 20 minutes)
askBreakTimeVcInfo.fullDescriptionText: To avoid screen headaches and neck strain, Focus Bear will encourage you to take breaks at regular intervals. We give you a 30 second warning so you can postpone the break if it's a bad time. We also detect if you're in a meeting and don't show breaks as that might lead to awkward screensharing moments otherwise!

popupAppointmentTimeVcInfo.title: It looks like you have an appointment that is about to start: <EVENT_TITLE>. Pausing your habits so you can attend the appointment.
popupAppointmentTimeVcInfo.buttonBackToHabitsText: Back to habits - I don't need to attend

chooseFrictionLevelVcInfo.title: How strict do you want Focus Bear to be?
chooseFrictionLevelVcInfo.superGentleText: Super gentle (non-full screen, instantly postpone habits)
chooseFrictionLevelVcInfo.slightlyStrictText: Slightly strict (Full screen with countdown timers for postponing habits)
chooseFrictionLevelVcInfo.superStrictText: Super strict (Password to postpone/skip habits + Instantly block non-allowed websites)
chooseFrictionLevelVcInfo.alertDoubleConfirmText: Are you sure? We recommend starting with a less strict mode initially and gradually amp up the strictness if you need it.

tourMessagesInfo.title: Focus Bear
tourMessagesInfo.description: Let's get you familiar with the Focus Bear Menu and we will have you up and running in no time!

tourMessagesInfo.title: Preferences
arrayListItems: Edit activities for your morning routine, evening routine, breaks throught the day.

tourMessagesInfo.title: Setup Focus mode
tourMessagesInfo.description: Setup focus modes to et into deep work with distraction blocking. You can remove blocks if you have an emergency.

WindowsSpecific.runningbg: Focus Bear is running in Background
WindowsSpecific.newVersionAvailable: A new version of Focus Bear is available. Do you wish to update to the latest version of Focus Bear?
WindowsSpecific.alreadyRunningLatestVersion: You are already running the latest version of Focus Bear.
WindowsSpecific.selectApps: Select Apps to use while focusing:
WindowsSpecific.clickToEnterManually: Can't find your app in the above list? Click here to enter manually.
WindowsSpecific.idYouKnowTheNames: If you know the name of the EXEs that you want to allow, you can add them here. You can enter multiple exe names separated with comma. (Example: chrome.exe, firefox.exe, notepad.exe)
WindowsSpecific.allProcessesWillStop: All the app related processes will stop and the app will close itself and run the Focus Bear Uninstaller.
WindowsSpecific.withPomodoroMode: With Pomodoro mode, you automatically cycle between focus sessions and breaks (e.g. 25 minutes on, 5 minutes off)
WindowsSpecific.weHaventBuiltPomodoro: We haven't built Pomodoro mode yet on Windows. How badly do you want this feature?
